name: Facebook - Dark Shiny Transparency V2 (beta)
description:
A new version of my Dark Shiny Transparency theme for Facebook that is rebuilt from scratch.  This is still a work in progress, and will be replacing my other Facebook themes eventually.

Many things yet to theme, code cleanup, and options need to be added.
additional_info:
10/16/18 - fixes for comments
8/13/17 - Update (buttons, feed, search, etc.)
